system.description:
You’ve learned to mix mundane subtlety with your psychic gifts. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your rogue levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Attack Modes feature.
  • Half your esper levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.e5mepl86zsavxhrp]{Self-Preservation} feature.
  • While you are psionically focused, you can choose to make yourself shadowy and indistinct. You have an expertise die on Stealth checks and creatures that wish to remember anything about your appearance must make an Intelligence check against your psionics DC to do so.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in esper, 3 levels in rogue
